review: I was having acute pain in the teeth, so I rushed to Dr. Prasenjit Saha. I was not able to take prior appointment, I just called in his clinic and went. He didn't kept me waiting too long and treated my teeth very well. He explained the problem very nicely. His precribed medicines gave me relief from the pain. I would highly recommend Dr. Prasenjit Saha.
